name: Poking The Game
description:
We wanted to create an experience that replicates the child-like desire to poke and break things you aren’t supposed to. We also wanted to create a sense of exploratory wonder, while still keeping the game simple to understand.

When you begin, you’ll be face-to-face with a sign that welcomes you, but states that under no circumstance should you touch anything. We’ll see how well that goes… Once you find a way in, you’ll find a wide array of pottery, statues, and other pieces of artwork to admire… from a distance of course. There may be some other patrons wandering around, so make sure to respect their space and keep your distance. There’s lots to discover.

Sheridan's Design Week Winter 2023 Team 1
